title: Game freezes my computer while loading into the game
body: As soon as champion select is over and the game starts loading up the screen goes black and the only way I am able to unfreeze my computer is to force shut down my computer. This has been happening for about a day for every game I try to start. I am using a Mac book air. Please help me! Thank you.

This happens to me as well today, but instead of freezing it just goes black in loading screen and i can just alt+cmb+esc out of it but it won't let me into the loading screen no matter how many times i reconnect.

Sometimes those freezes can happen when your network has troubles making the new connection to the game servers when the loading screen starts. I want to have you try updating a couple network settings using the steps below, and let me know if those help or not by testing it in a custom game.

[**DNS **](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq4) & [**Port Forwarding**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq7)
